entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Grande-Vallée
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
